feature.label: KNIME Public Server Access
feature.description: Contains a view for KNIME's example workflow server. This view is a down scaled version of the KNIME Enterprise Server View. It allows you to connect to a workflow server that is provided by KNIME and to download example flows from there. All other features and options in this view are disabled. (For example, upload, server side workflow execution, user rights management, scheduled execution, etc.) This plug-in is the intellectual property of KNIME.com, Zurich, Switzerland. Copyright (c) 2013, KNIME.com Zurich Switzerland. All rights reserved. This plug-in is not part of the Open Source KNIME Platform. It is not released under GPL, like most parts of KNIME. It is available at no charge and it can be used without restrictions. It is provided "as is", without any warranty. You may NOT freely copy it, nor modify or distribute it. For details, please refer to the license agreement.
feature.copyright: The KNIME Example Server View is a copyrighted work owned by KNIME.com, Zurich, Switzerland ("KNIME.com"), or a third party. Copyright (c) 2013, KNIME.com Zurich Switzerland. All rights reserved.
feature.license: Terms for License of the KNIME Example Server View 1. TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, ALL WARRANTY IS EXCLUDED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES FOR UNINTERRUPTED AND ERROR-FREE OPERATION, FOR OPERATION IN COMBINATION WITH OTHER HARDWARE, SOFTWARE, SYSTEMS OR DATA, FOR MERCHANTABILITY, FOR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND FOR NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD PARTY RIGHTS. 5.2 TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, ALL LIABILITY OF KNIME.COM IS HEREBY WAIVED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, LIABILITY FOR FINANCIAL DAMAGE, PROPERTY DAMAGE AND PERSONAL INJURY IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE OF THE KNIME Example Server View, LOSS OF DATA, DAMAGE OF DATA, DAMAGE TO COMPUTER SYSTEMS, FUNCTIONAL DISRUPTION OF COMPUTER SYSTEMS, DAMAGE OR LOSS OF PROFITS DUE TO THE WRONGFUL OPERATION OR NON-OPERATION OF THE KNIME Example Server View. 6. In the events of such termination, the Licensee shall cease to use the KNIME Example Server View and destroy all copies in his/her possession immediately. 7. Data Protection KNIME.com complies with the applicable Swiss data protection laws. The Licensee consents to KNIME.com using the Licensee's personal data for its own marketing purposes. 8.
